list.name: WILD-FLAMES
list.description: Amber can have two fuel puddles on the ground simultaneously and she will recharge her Super automatically when standing near one.
list.descriptionHtml: Amber can have two fuel puddles on the ground simultaneously and she will recharge her Super automatically when standing near one.

list.name: SCORCHIN-SIPHON
list.description: While being near a puddle of fire fluid, Amber uses it to reload her firebreathing x% faster.
list.descriptionHtml: While being near a puddle of fire fluid, Amber uses it to reload her firebreathing x% faster.
